title: Hold Tight
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Happy birthday
[Chorus]
They hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, ooh they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
Lips won't let me go, lips won't let me go, oh
They hold on tight, they hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, they hold on tight
Ooh, they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
[Verse 1]
Don't let this go to your head
But you're the best I've ever had
Not to mention that thing is swollen
You got me oh so in a trance
Something like a ziploc
, 
but a lip lock
Want you wrapped around my arm like a wrist watch
 (Oh)
So hard walking out
You got me stuck like crazy glue, ooh
[Chorus]
They hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, ooh they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
Lips won't let me go, lips won't let me go oh
Hold on tight, they hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, they hold on tight
Ooh, they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go

[Verse 2]
Got me tossing turning in the bed
Your place is where I'd rather be instead
You don't know your strength
Missing you is like adrenaline
Ooh when you got me in a gridlock, what a great spot
Yeah that turned up kind of love, and it just won't stop (No)
So hard walking out
You got me stuck like crazy glue, ooh-wee
[Chorus]
They hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, ooh they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
Lips won't let me go, lips won't let me go
Ooh, they hold on tight, they hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, they hold on tight
Ooh, they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
[Bridge]
Oh baby, holdin' back the faces I would make
I'm a fan and you're the rockstar, makin' it hard on me
Visualize a monster, cause you're too bad for me
Shot that arrow, I'm hit, need you right near me
I try to maintain
So don't mind if I turn away, no no
I try to maintain
So don't mind if I turn away
, ooh

[Chorus]
They hold on tight
They hold on tight, ooh-oh they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
Lips won't let me go, lips won't let me go, oh
They hold on tight, they hold on tight
Yeah, they hold on tight, they hold on tight
Ooh, they hold on tight
Them lips won't let me go
